title: Electronic cigarette
summary: An electronic cigarette[notes 1][1] is an electronic device that simulates tobacco smoking.  It consists of an  atomizer, a power source such as a battery, and a container such as a cartridge or tank.  Instead of smoke, the user inhales vapor.[2] As such, using an e-cigarette is often called "vaping".[3] The atomizer is a heating element that atomizes a liquid solution called e-liquid.[4] E-cigarettes are activated by taking a puff or pressing a button.[3][5] Some look like traditional cigarettes,[3][6] and most versions are reusable.[7]
